attributes.action: Admit to the world that the act of sending the white offspring of the UK to Aust as child immigrants was gutless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was on October 10th 1947 , I recently learned , that I and others, were illegally coerced into embarking,on the SS Ormonde, to Fremantle in West Aust as child migrants !On the 22nd of June 1948 , I also recently learned that the Empire Windrush,disembarked 492 foreigners from Jamaica at Tilbury, where I and others were forcibly deported from,only 8 months before! A peer , Mickey Clynch, died earlier this year sir, in Aust . His CARER told the world ! No mother,no father,no sisters,no brothers,no aunties no one!As with me , he probably had never heard of this rust bucket,the Empire Windrush, that had our replacements aboard.I ask you sir , to bellow to the world that the British were indeed GUTLESS in throwing their offspring out of this country and into the arms of paedophiles and slave drivers, whilst complete foreigners from Jamaica , India , Sri Lanka , Pakistan , Guyana , Iran , Iraq and many other freeloaders were introduced as replacements for ourselves who GOD gave this land to ! Please admit to GUTLESSNESS,of the British, and a questionable ethic!This land is mine !

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
